org.apache.juneau.json

Class JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.ContextBuilder
      • org.apache.juneau.BeanContextBuilder
        • org.apache.juneau.BeanTraverseBuilder
          • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerBuilder
            • org.apache.juneau.serializer.WriterSerializerBuilder
              • org.apache.juneau.json.JsonSerializerBuilder
                • org.apache.juneau.json.JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder

  • public class JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder
extends JsonSerializerBuilder
    Builder class for building instances of JSON Schema serializers.

      • addDescriptionsTo

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder addDescriptionsTo(String value)
        Configuration property: Add descriptions.

        Identifies which categories of types that descriptions should be automatically added to generated schemas.

        The description is the result of calling ClassMeta.getReadableName().

        See Also:
        • JsonSchemaGenerator.JSONSCHEMA_addDescriptionsTo
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • addExamplesTo

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder addExamplesTo(String value)
        Configuration property: Add examples.

        Identifies which categories of types that examples should be automatically added to generated schemas.

        The examples come from calling ClassMeta.getExample(BeanSession) which in turn gets examples from the following:

        • Example
        • BeanContext.BEAN_examples
        See Also:
        • JsonSchemaGenerator.JSONSCHEMA_addExamplesTo
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanDefMapper

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder beanDefMapper(Class<? extends BeanDefMapper> value)
        Configuration property: Schema definition mapper.

        Interface to use for converting Bean classes to definition IDs and URIs.

        Used primarily for defining common definition sections for beans in Swagger JSON.

        This setting is ignored if JsonSchemaGenerator.JSONSCHEMA_useBeanDefs is not enabled.

        See Also:
        • JsonSchemaGenerator.JSONSCHEMA_beanDefMapper
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • useBeanDefs

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder useBeanDefs()
        Configuration property: Use bean definitions.

        When enabled, schemas on beans will be serialized as the following:

        { type: 'object', '$ref': '#/definitions/TypeId' }

        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

        Description copied from class: SerializerBuilder

      • ignoreRecursions

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder ignoreRecursions(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: BeanTraverseBuilder
        Configuration property: Ignore recursion errors.

        If true, when we encounter the same object when traversing a tree, we set the value to null. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.

        Notes:
        • Checking for recursion can cause a small performance penalty.
        See Also:
        • BeanTraverseContext.BEANTRAVERSE_ignoreRecursions
        Overrides:
        ignoreRecursions in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.

      • maxDepth

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder maxDepth(int value)
        Description copied from class: BeanTraverseBuilder
        Configuration property: Max traversal depth.

        Abort traversal if specified depth is reached in the POJO tree.
        If this depth is exceeded, an exception is thrown.
        This prevents stack overflows from occurring when trying to traverse models with recursive references.

        See Also:
        • BeanTraverseContext.BEANTRAVERSE_maxDepth
        Overrides:
        maxDepth in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is 100.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanClassVisibility

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder beanClassVisibility(Visibility value)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Minimum bean class visibility.

        Classes are not considered beans unless they meet the minimum visibility requirements.

        For example, if the visibility is PUBLIC and the bean class is protected, then the class will not be interpreted as a bean class and will be treated as a string.

        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanClassVisibility
        Overrides:
        beanClassVisibility in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is Visibility.PUBLIC.

        This object (for method chaining).

      • beanFilters

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder beanFilters(boolean append,
                                               Object... values)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Bean filters.

        Same as BeanContextBuilder.beanFilters(Object...) but allows you to optionally overwrite the previous value.

        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_beanFilters
        Overrides:
        beanFilters in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        append - If true, the previous value is appended to. Otherwise, the previous value is replaced.
        values - The new values for this property.
        Values can consist of any of the following types:
        • Any bean class that specifies a value for @Bean(typeName).
        • Any subclass of BeanDictionaryList containing a collection of bean classes with type name annotations.
        • Any subclass of BeanDictionaryMap containing a mapping of type names to classes without type name annotations.
        • Any array or collection of the objects above.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • pojoSwaps

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder pojoSwaps(boolean append,
                                             Object... values)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: POJO swaps.

        POJO swaps are used to "swap out" non-serializable classes with serializable equivalents during serialization, and "swap in" the non-serializable class during parsing.

        An example of a POJO swap would be a Calendar object that gets swapped out for an ISO8601 string.

        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_pojoSwaps
        Overrides:
        pojoSwaps in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        append - If true, the previous value is appended to.
        Otherwise, the previous value is replaced.
        values - The new value for this property.
        Values can consist of any of the following types:
        • Strings.
        • Arrays and collections of strings.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • pojoSwaps

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder pojoSwaps(Class<?>... values)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: POJO swaps.
        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_pojoSwaps
        Overrides:
        pojoSwaps in class JsonSerializerBuilder

        values - The values to add to this property.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • pojoSwaps

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder pojoSwaps(Object... values)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: POJO swaps.
        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_pojoSwaps
        Overrides:
        pojoSwaps in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        values - The values to add to this property.
        Values can consist of any of the following types:
        • Any subclass of PojoSwap.
        • Any surrogate class. A shortcut for defining a SurrogateSwap.
        • Any array or collection of the objects above.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • sortProperties

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder sortProperties(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Sort bean properties.

        When true, all bean properties will be serialized and access in alphabetical order. Otherwise, the natural order of the bean properties is used which is dependent on the JVM vendor.

        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_sortProperties
        Overrides:
        sortProperties in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • sortProperties

      • useEnumNames

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder useEnumNames()
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Use enum names.

        When enabled, enums are always serialized by name instead of using Object.toString().

      • useInterfaceProxies

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder useInterfaceProxies(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Use interface proxies.

        If true, then interfaces will be instantiated as proxy classes through the use of an InvocationHandler if there is no other way of instantiating them.

        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_useInterfaceProxies
        Overrides:
        useInterfaceProxies in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is true.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • useJavaBeanIntrospector

        public JsonSchemaSerializerBuilder useJavaBeanIntrospector(boolean value)
        Description copied from class: BeanContextBuilder
        Configuration property: Use Java Introspector.

        Using the built-in Java bean introspector will not pick up fields or non-standard getters/setters.

        Notes:
        • Most @Bean annotations will be ignored if you enable this setting.
        See Also:
        • BeanContext.BEAN_useJavaBeanIntrospector
        Overrides:
        useJavaBeanIntrospector in class JsonSerializerBuilder
        Parameters:
        value - The new value for this property.
        The default is false.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
